headline: Uber Technologies, Inc. (UBER): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Uber Technologies, Inc. on Nikhs’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on UBER. Uber Technologies, Inc.’s share was trading at $79.78 as of January 28th. UBER’s trailing and forward P/E were 41.82 and 19.61 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Uber Technologies, Inc. develops and operates proprietary technology applications in the […]

headline: Should You Buy Uber Stock Now for a ‘Multitrillion-Dollar’ Opportunity in Robotaxis?
summary: With management betting big on robotaxis as a future growth engine, should you buy Uber stock now?

headline: Uber Verdict And Robotaxi Push Put Long Term Valuation In Focus
summary: Federal jury finds Uber liable in a landmark sexual assault bellwether trial tied to over 3,000 similar claims. Uber and WeRide announce plans to deploy at least 1,200 robotaxis across Abu Dhabi, Dubai, and Riyadh. NYSC:UBER last closed at $74.77, with a value score of 6 and a 3 year return that is very large. For Uber Technologies (NYSE:UBER), these twin developments highlight both legal risk and product expansion. The stock closed at $74.77, with returns of 118.0% over 3 years and 23.3%...
